original_title: Un village empoisonné par la CIA ? Pont-Saint-Esprit - 1951
overview: It is August 1951 and an entire French village goes crazy. People are screaming in the streets and throwing themselves out of windows. 300 people are affected and 7 end up dead. Wild theories start circulating to explain the tragedy. 60 years later declassified documents from the United States reveal that the CIA conducted experiments on unsuspecting citizens.
title: CIA Covert Experiments
